Contents: @Z3styLime Hello! There are two possible reasons for a Paypal not linking to an account: One is that the Paypal account region must match the region of the PSN account (UK and UK) or they won't link. Two is that you can only link your Paypal account to one account at a time. Is it these?^DB

Name: Ask PlayStation UK

Two is that you can only link your Paypal account to one account at a time. Is it these?^DB
